name: Pianimal Wild - Piano with animal sounds
name_original: Pianimal Wild - Piano with animal sounds
description:
"Pianimal Wild" is a piano for little kids that includes sounds and illustrations of cute animals, with this app your kids will gonna learn the different noises of each animals.

This version includes a musical scale of this animals: Tiger, Bird, Bear, Elephant, Frog, Monkey, Lion and Mosquito.

You can also switch musical scale format on settings.

Enjoy it!
